title: UBIQUITI UniFi Security Gateway PRO USG-PRO-4

posts.text:
Tæplega ársgömul UBIQUITI UniFi Security Gateway PRO USG-PRO-4 router græja til sölu.
Verðhugmynd: 35þ
** SELT **
Features:
The UniFi® Security Gateway Pro extends the UniFi Enterprise System to provide cost-effective, reliable routing and advanced security for your network.
The UniFi Security Gateway Pro offers two optional SFP ports for fiber connectivity to support backhaul applications.
The UniFi Security Gateway Pro is housed in a durable, rackmount chassis.
The UniFi® Security Gateway offers advanced firewall policies to protect your network and its data.
The UniFi® Security Gateway Pro can create virtual network segments for security and network traffic management.
Specification:
Dimensions: 484 x 44 x 164 mm (19.06 x 1.73 x 6.46")
Weight: 2.3 kg (5.07 lb)
Max. Power Consumption: 40W
Power Supply: Internal AC/DC Power Adapter, 60W (24V, 2.5A)
Power Input: 110 - 240VAC
LEDs: System Status
LEDs: Data Ports Speed/Link/Activity
Networking Interfaces:
Serial Console Port
Data Ports:(1) RJ45 Serial Port, (2) 10/100/1000 RJ45 Ports, (2) 10/100/1000 RJ45/SFP Combination Ports
Layer 3 Forwarding Performance:
Packet Size: 64 Bytes, 1,000,000 pps
Packet Size: 512 Bytes or Larger, 1 Gbps per Port Line Rate
Processor: Dual-Core 1 GHz, MIPS64 with Hardware Acceleration for Packet Processing
System Memory: 2 GB DDR3 RAM
On-Board Flash Storage: 4 GB
Certifications: CE, FCC, IC
Rackmount: Yes
Operating Temperature: -10 to 45° C (14 to 113° F)
Operating Humidity: 10 to 90% Noncondensing
